name: Banksy Google Images
description: Banksy Graffiti style for Google Images IMPORTANT NOTE: This is for the NZ site - to make it work for your country's google images site replace the url in the second line of the code with your own (copy and paste from the address bar) Check out Banksy Google and Banksy Facebook Login

user.name: blablablablabla
